document.full_text: rafael nadal will keep the no. 1 ranking for at least another three weeks after a 6-1, 6-3 victory over croatia's marin cilic in the quarterfinals of the italian open in rome.
document.title: sports briefing | tennis: nadal to remain no. 1
lines_and_colors: rafael nadal will keep the no. 1 ranking for at least another three weeks after a 6-1, 6-3 victory over croatia's marin cilic in the quarterfinals of the italian open in rome.
